body: Years later waw this kinda plot is hard to come by
Fuck yes esta es mi mierda
Thanks for the translation. I like the cover very much, especially that milf
Almost forgot this existed in all honesty . Time to wait again :l

Saho corropted him when he's small yes. The daughter is tsundere yes, but the MC have sex with Saho since childhood and he kind of dead set on her. However, the daughter also seriously love him. She confess her feeling to him and thing kinda move fast they have sex right after confession, but MC that dead set on Saho, IMO he should stop her right away. However he didn't and they moving on with kind of weird relationship where he and the daughter had sex while he always thinking of Saho. That is what I hate about him. He should stop her before her feeling develope too deep for him. Then, later he just rejected her said that he always in love with Saho.
@anti76 MC's father propose marriage to Saho, and she didn't refuse they still on the way with reorganize and sstuff. Before the marriage taking place MC just confess at their before marriage family meeting. That he love Saho, and the daghter that he having sex all this while he just feeling like she is his sister.
Somehow this seems lacking. A fap was not given
@7thsin , Did that oba-san have sex with other man except that boy?

I have a suggestion for harem loving user. This male protagonist is a bad protagonist to lead a harem. He just trash that can't convey his feeling, and need to be forgiven by all the female. I read japanese version and it really left bad impression afterward, so I suggest those who think that this will have a harem end. It's not, but it still a good end nonetheless. But, be aware he is being forgiven by the female not becacuse he did something that deserved it, but she just forgive him.
Now we wait for another month for chapter 3...

I'd love to thank Lazarus LP for editing and grammar checking the choice MILF selections they have given us today. Also, I'd like to give a shoutout to Covertopsboobs for the wonderful translations.  Keep it up.
